required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Nutrition Education Module for Preschooler Children
clinical_study.official_title: the Effectiveness of Nutrition Education Module to Knowledge of Preschooler Children in Public Kindergarten at 3 Districts of Riau Province

lead_sponsor.agency: SEAMEO Regional Centre for Food and Nutrition

clinical_study.source: SEAMEO Regional Centre for Food and Nutrition

brief_summary.textblock: This study evaluates the knowledge of preschooler children before and after intervention of nutrition education using nutrition education module for preschooler children. The teachers will be given training regarding the module and deliver it in the class during the intervention.

detailed_description.textblock:
A nutrition education module for preschooler children had been developed in the previous study. The module consists of 3 topics of nutrition (my meal plate, fruits and vegetables, healthy snacks). Each topic consists of 4 activities engaging children and teachers. A total of 12 activities will be delivered on 4 consecutive school day every week.
The teacher will deliver the nutrition education which trained prior to the study.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: a quasi-experimental research design with pre-and post-test control group design

primary_outcome.measure: Changes on nutrition related knowledge before and after intevention
primary_outcome.description: a self administered structured questionnaire regarding nutrition related knowledge (my meal plate, fruits and vegetables, healthy snacks) using pictures yielding a total score between 0-100

clinical_study.condition: Children Who Registered on the Selected Public Kindergarten and Agree to Follow the Study Assigned by Their Parents and Teacher

arm_group.description: 12 activities of the nutrition education module pre and post test
no intervention pre and post test

intervention.description: 12 activities of nutrition education module will deliver by the teacher. The activities consists of coloring my meal plate, playing pictures, story telling: Zizi and Ziko, pictures station, fruits and vegetables card, cooking class, planting bean sprouts, field visit to fruits and vegetables garden, making collages, dot to dot, watching video, making healthy snacks

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- children registered in selected public kindergarten
- grade/class B kindergarten
- willing to follow the study
Exclusion Criteria:
-

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: SEAMEO Regional Centre for Food and Nutrition
